title: Setting up mbsync to work with XOAUTH2
snippet: For a long time I used offlineimap to synchronize my emails between the email providers and my computer. Having access to all my emails offline on my computer is pretty handy. But after seeing the brutal efficiency advantage of mbsync over offlineimap, and having had delay issues with offlineimap myself â€¦
author: Nicolas F. R. A. Prado
